message.content:
探索如何使用 GitHub CLI (gh) 來建立 PR：

1. 檢查系統是否有安裝 gh CLI
2. 查看 gh pr create 的完整參數和用法
3. 了解如何自動指定 reviewer
4. 了解如何設定 PR 標籤和專案

請提供 gh CLI 建立 PR 的完整指令範例。

content.text: 我來幫你探索 GitHub CLI 建立 PR 的完整用法。讓我先檢查系統環境和 gh CLI 的相關資訊。

input.description: Check if GitHub CLI is installed and display version

content.text:
Exited with code 0.Final output:

/opt/homebrew/bin/gh
gh version 2.86.0 (2026-01-21)
https://github.com/cli/cli/releases/tag/v2.86.0

input.description: Display GitHub CLI pr create command help documentation

content.text:
Exited with code 0.Final output:

Create a pull request on GitHub.

Upon success, the URL of the created pull request will be printed.

When the current branch isn't fully pushed to a git remote, a prompt will ask where
to push the branch and offer an option to fork the base repository. Use `--head` to
explicitly skip any forking or pushing behavior.

`--head` supports `<user>:<branch>` syntax to select a head repo owned by `<user>`.
Using an organization as the `<user>` is currently not supported.
For more information, see <https://github.com/cli/cli/issues/10093>

A prompt will also ask for the title and the body of the pull request. Use `--title` and
`--body` to skip this, or use `--fill` to autofill these values from git commits.
It's important to notice that if the `--title` and/or `--body` are also provided
alongside `--fill`, the values specified by `--title` and/or `--body` will
take precedence and overwrite any autofilled content.

The base branch for the created PR can be specified using the `--base` flag. If not provided,
the value of `gh-merge-base` git branch config will be used. If not configured, the repository's
default branch will be used. Run `git config branch.{current}.gh-merge-base {base}` to configure
the current branch to use the specified merge base.

Link an issue to the pull request by referencing the issue in the body of the pull
request. If the body text mentions `Fixes #123` or `Closes #123`, the referenced issue
will automatically get closed when the pull request gets merged.

By default, users with write access to the base repository can push new commits to the
head branch of the pull request. Disable this with `--no-maintainer-edit`.

Adding a pull request to projects requires authorization with the `project` scope.
To authorize, run `gh auth refresh -s project`.


USAGE
  gh pr create [flags]

ALIASES
  gh pr new

FLAGS
  -a, --assignee login       Assign people by their login. Use "@me" to self-assign.
  -B, --base branch          The branch into which you want your code merged
  -b, --body string          Body for the pull request
  -F, --body-file file       Read body text from file (use "-" to read from standard input)
  -d, --draft                Mark pull request as a draft
      --dry-run              Print details instead of creating the PR. May still push git changes.
  -e, --editor               Skip prompts and open the text editor to write the title and body in. The first line is the title and the remaining text is the body.
  -f, --fill                 Use commit info for title and body
      --fill-first           Use first commit info for title and body
      --fill-verbose         Use commits msg+body for description
  -H, --head branch          The branch that contains commits for your pull request (default [current branch])
  -l, --label name           Add labels by name
  -m, --milestone name       Add the pull request to a milestone by name
      --no-maintainer-edit   Disable maintainer's ability to modify pull request
  -p, --project title        Add the pull request to projects by title
      --recover string       Recover input from a failed run of create
  -r, --reviewer handle      Request reviews from people or teams by their handle
  -T, --template file        Template file to use as starting body text
  -t, --title string         Title for the pull request
  -w, --web                  Open the web browser to create a pull request

INHERITED FLAGS
      --help                     Show help for command
  -R, --repo [HOST/]OWNER/REPO   Select another repository using the [HOST/]OWNER/REPO format

EXAMPLES
  $ gh pr create --title "The bug is fixed" --body "Everything works again"
  $ gh pr create --reviewer monalisa,hubot  --reviewer myorg/team-name
  $ gh pr create --project "Roadmap"
  $ gh pr create --base develop --head monalisa:feature
  $ gh pr create --template "pull_request_template.md"

LEARN MORE
  Use `gh <command> <subcommand> --help` for more information about a command.
  Read the manual at https://cli.github.com/manual
  Learn about exit codes using `gh help exit-codes`
  Learn about accessibility experiences using `gh help accessibility`

完美！我已經取得 GitHub CLI 的相關資訊。讓我整理並提供你詳細的探索結果。

## GitHub CLI (gh) 建立 PR 的完整指令參考

### 1. 系統環境確認

你的系統已安裝 GitHub CLI：
- **版本**：gh version 2.86.0 (2026-01-21)
- **路徑**：/opt/homebrew/bin/gh
- **當前分支**：fix-detail-table
- **預設目標分支**：main

### 2. gh pr create 的完整參數說明

根據 `gh pr create --help` 的輸出，以下是所有可用參數：

#### 核心參數

| 參數 | 簡寫 | 用途 | 說明 |
|------|------|------|------|
| `--title` | `-t` | PR 標題 | 指定 PR 的標題文本 |
| `--body` | `-b` | PR 描述 | 指定 PR 的主體描述 |
| `--body-file` | `-F` | 從檔案讀取描述 | 從檔案讀取 PR 描述（使用 `-` 從標準輸入讀取） |
| `--base` | `-B` | 目標分支 | 指定要合併到的分支（預設：repository default branch） |
| `--head` | `-H` | 來源分支 | 指定包含提交的分支（預設：當前分支） |

#### 自動填充選項

| 參數 | 用途 |
|------|------|
| `--fill` | 從 git commits 自動填充標題和描述 |
| `--fill-first` | 使用第一個 commit 的資訊 |
| `--fill-verbose` | 使用 commits 的訊息+主體 |
| `-e, --editor` | 跳過提示，直接開啟文字編輯器 |

#### 審查者和受指派人

| 參數 | 簡寫 | 用途 | 範例 |
|------|------|------|------|
| `--reviewer` | `-r` | 請求審查 | `-r username` 或 `-r org/team-name` |
| `--assignee` | `-a` | 指派人員 | `-a @me` 自我指派 |

#### 標籤、里程碑和專案

| 參數 | 簡寫 | 用途 |
|------|------|------|
| `--label` | `-l` | 添加標籤 |
| `--milestone` | `-m` | 添加到里程碑 |
| `--project` | `-p` | 添加到專案（需要 `project` scope） |

#### 其他選項

| 參數 | 用途 |
|------|------|
| `--draft` | `-d` | 標記為草稿 PR |
| `--no-maintainer-edit` | 禁用維護者編輯 |
| `--template` | `-T` | 使用模板檔案作為初始內容 |
| `--dry-run` | 列印詳情而不建立 PR |
| `--web` | `-w` | 在網頁瀏覽器中建立 PR |
| `--recover` | 從失敗的執行中恢復輸入 |

---

### 3. 實用的 PR 建立指令範例

#### 基礎示例

```bash
# 簡單建立 PR（會提示輸入標題和描述）
gh pr create

# 指定標題和描述
gh pr create --title "Fix detail table sorting" --body "This PR fixes the sorting issue in the detail table component"

# 指定目標分支
gh pr create --base main --title "Fix detail table" --body "Fixed sorting in detail table"
```

#### 自動填充 Commits

```bash
# 從 commit 資訊自動填充
gh pr create --fill

# 使用第一個 commit 資訊
gh pr create --fill-first

# 使用詳細的 commit 訊息
gh pr create --fill-verbose
```

#### 指定審查者（自動指派）

```bash
# 指定單個審查者
gh pr create --reviewer username --title "Fix detail table"

# 指定多個審查者
gh pr create --reviewer user1,user2 --reviewer org/team-name --title "Fix detail table"

# 自我指派為審查者
gh pr create --assignee @me --title "My PR"
```

#### 添加標籤和專案

```bash
# 添加標籤
gh pr create --label "bug" --label "high-priority" --title "Fix detail table"

# 添加到里程碑
gh pr create --milestone "v1.0.0" --title "Fix detail table"

# 添加到專案（需先授權 project scope）
# gh auth refresh -s project
gh pr create --project "Roadmap" --title "Fix detail table"
```

#### 複合範例

```bash
# 完整的 PR 建立指令
gh pr create \
  --base main \
  --title "fix(vsaas-portal): fix detail table sorting" \
  --body "This PR fixes the detail table sorting issue\n\nFixes #123" \
  --reviewer user1,org/team-name \
  --assignee @me \
  --label "bug,vsaas-portal" \
  --project "Roadmap"
```

---

### 4. 你當前專案的最佳實踐範例

基於你的專案結構（webtech-monorepo，使用 Conventional Commits），建議的指令：

```bash
# 從當前分支 (fix-detail-table) 建立 PR 到 main
gh pr create \
  --base main \
  --fill \
  --reviewer team-lead \
  --label "fix,vsaas-portal" \
  --project "Development"
```

或使用編輯器方式：

```bash
gh pr create --base main --editor
```

---

### 5. 額外授權需求

如果要使用專案功能，需要額外的 scope 授權：

```bash
# 授予 project scope
gh auth refresh -s project

# 檢查當前授權
gh auth status
```

---

### 6. 工作流程建議

對於你當前的分支 `fix-detail-table`，建議流程：

1. **確認分支已推送**
   ```bash
   git push origin fix-detail-table
   ```

2. **使用 fill 自動從 commits 填充資訊**
   ```bash
   gh pr create --fill --base main
   ```

3. **如需指定審查者和標籤**
   ```bash
   gh pr create \
     --fill \
     --base main \
     --reviewer your-team \
     --label "fix" \
     --label "vsaas-portal"
   ```

---

現在你已經掌握了 GitHub CLI 建立 PR 的完整知識。需要我提供任何特定場景的指令範例嗎？
